amendment.description: Amendment requires that benefits of pre-payment of mortgage balances be explained in the consumer education guide produced by HUD.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in House Report 111-98 to require that benefits of pre-payment of mortgage balances be explained in the consumer education guide produced by HUD.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Dahlkemper amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A010) offered by Mrs. Dahlkemper.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Dahlkemper amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
